Name: [Energy] Orange God
Desc: Triggering Perfect Dodge generates 6 Energy for the Agent. This effect can trigger once every <color=#2BAD00>10s</color>.
Desc2: This orange juice is popular among girls. Each can packs the nutritional punch of thirty oranges. "We carefully choose only the finest oranges. One of ours is as good as ten of another kind. That means with just three oranges, you're getting the nutrients of thirty!"
